name: Cube Colliders
description:
What started as a little game jam-esque game started at Assembly Winter 2020, became a full game project for uni.

This is a PvP "fighting" game where you play as the renowned Unity Cube. You harm other players by colliding with the other players, the one with higher velocity wins. Use the terrain and various power ups to your advantage to smash the other cubes away!

Features:

  • Two players via single keyboard.
  • Up to four players with controllers (currently 3 or more controllers required to access 3-4 player. WIP)
  • Change the skin and trail of your cube
  • Add a CPU as a second player to 1 v 1.

And more..

This is only a local multiplayer demo to get a report out of for Spring semester.
